outcome: Evidence of foreign cyber-espionage linked to Halden's mysterious death emerges.

events.description: A coded map recovered from Halden's files points to an external hacker group based abroad.
Communications indicate the hacker group's attempt to access Council communication channels.
Intelligence agencies track encrypted transmissions from within Stenograd to foreign nodes.
Government officials blame foreign cyber-espionage for recent disruptions, declaring a security lock-down.
